title: Trump Warns US Jews in Most Danger Since Holocaust
message:
JNS.org – Republican presidential nominee Donald Trump said on Saturday that Jews in the United States are facing their greatest threat since World War II.
He made similar remarks on Thursday at a “Fighting Antisemitism” event with Miriam Adelson at the Trump National Golf Club in Bedminster, New Jersey.
The New Jersey event, featuring prominent Jewish supporters, took place the day the Trump campaign launched an initiative to reach out to Jewish voters.
Trump’s comments come amid a surge in antisemitism in the United States and globally after Hamas started a war against Israel on Oct. 7, 2023.
In the United States, the ADL recorded 7,523 incidents in 2023 compared to 3,697 in 2022.

title: Jewish groups , Ottawa mayor boycott pride over Gaza statement
message:
Canadian Jewish organizations and the Ottawa mayor withdrew from attending a pride parade in the capital over the organizer’s statement of solidarity with Palestinians that alleged that Israel was conducting genocide in Gaza.
“We are deeply concerned by the rising tide of antisemitism and Islamophobia we are witnessing here in Canada,” said Capital Pride.
(credit: Arlyn McAdorey/Reuters)The Jewish Federation of Ottawa said Wednesday that it had attempted to meet with Capital Pride about the remarks, but the organization’s board was unwilling to reconsider its position.
“Capital Pride has chosen a divisive position that further marginalizes Jews, who are victimized by more hate crimes than any other group in Canada.
CTV News reported on Saturday that the Children’s Hospital of Eastern Ontario and The Ottawa Hospital also withdrew from the parade as a result of Capital Pride’s statement.

title: Jewish NGOs to Host Sideline Events at Democratic National Convention
message:
JNS.org – While presidential nominee Kamala Harris and running mate Tim Walz take hits from both right and left for their stances on Israel, the Democratic National Convention will feature a number of events tied to the American Jewish community.
The Jewish Democratic Council of America (JDCA), which is led by Halie Soifer, Harris’s former national security adviser, will hold a series of events on the DNC sidelines throughout the week.
Doug Emhoff, Harris’s Jewish husband, is set to keynote on Tuesday.
Republican nominee Donald Trump recently denigrated Emhoff’s Jewishness, calling him a “crappy Jew,” while critiquing American Jews who vote Democratic.
The Republican Jewish Coalition has issued a “Praise Israel” challenge, saying it would donate 1,800 trees to the Jewish state in honor of anyone who would address the Democratic convention from the main stage and ask the crowd to cheer for Israel.
